```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(etrm)
data("spreads161230")
```

Inspect the spreads data
```{r}
spreads161230
```

Create an instance of the MSFC class
```{r}
fwd <- msfc(tdate = as.Date("2016-12-30"),
            include = spreads161230$Include,
            contract = spreads161230$Contract,
            sdate = spreads161230$Start,
            edate = spreads161230$End,
            f = spreads161230$Closing)
```

Available methods are "summary", "plot" and "show"
```{r}
summary(fwd)
```

```{r, fig.dim=c(7, 4)}
plot(fwd)
```

```{r}
head(show(fwd))
```
